en-US.title: Resources
en-US.lineOne: More resources are still under development.
en-US.lineTwo: If you are interested in participating in the design of Element Plus, be our guest to contact us via element-plus@outlook.com.
en-US.axureIntro: By importing Element Plus in Axure, you can easily apply all the components we provide during interaction design.
en-US.sketchIntro: Apply components from Element Plus template, so you can improve design efficiency while keeping a unified visual style.
en-US.figmaIntro: Newly designed Figma component library for 2022 with new features such as Auto-layout and Variants.

zh-CN.title: 资源
zh-CN.lineOne: 更多设计资源正在处于开发状态。
zh-CN.lineTwo: 如果您有兴趣参与 Element Plus 的设计，请通过 element-plus@outlook.com 联系我们
zh-CN.axureIntro: 通过在 Axure 中导入 Element Plus 组件库，可以在交互设计阶段方便地调用常用的组件
zh-CN.sketchIntro: 从 Element Plus 模版中快速调用常用组件，在提升设计效率的同时，保证统一的视觉风格
zh-CN.figmaIntro: 2022年全新设计的 Figma 组件库，应用了自动布局与变体等新特性
